welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.description: Create a wallet to send and receive money with friends using cryptocurrency.

pinSetup.chooseSubtitle: Enter a 6-digit PIN to access your mobile wallet
pinSetup.lockedSubtitle: To protect your information, access has been locked for 5 minutes. Try again later.

confirm.alertMessage: You’ve selected the wrong mnemonic phrase. Please reread your phrase, write it down, and try again.
confirm.title: Confirm Your Mnemonic Phrase
confirm.alertDescription: If you loose your recovery pharase there is no possible way to recover yoour account
confirm.alertUnderstand: Yes, I understand the risk of loosing my recovery phrase.

write.description: You’ll need this phrase to access your account on another device.
write.title: Write Down Your Mnemonic Phrase
write.alertDescription: Be careful where you paste your phrase. Your wallet is only as secure as the place you store your phrase.
write.alertUnderstand: Yes, I understand the risk of storing my phrase online.

success.title:
Your wallet 
 is ready!
success.description: Send, receive, and store your coins.

addFunds.title: Transfer from External Wallet
addFunds.subtitle: Use the following address to transfer MOBI or XLM to your wallet.

loadingView.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try again.
loadingView.title: Loading
